Recipe.Name: Content
Recipe.Description: Sets up content types and content used on the Moov2 Website.
Recipe.Author: Moov2

ContentMenuItem.Description: Adds a Content Item to the menu.

HtmlMenuItem.Description: Renders some custom HTML in the menu.

MenuItem.Description: Represents a simple custom link with a text and an url.

NavigationQueryMenuItem.Description: Injects menu items from a Query

ShapeMenuItem.Description: Injects menu items from a Shape

TaxonomyNavigationMenuItem.Description: Injects menu items from a Taxonomy

AdminMenuPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Adds a menu item to the Admin menu that links to this content item.

AudioPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides common metadata for an Audio Media.

AutoroutePart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Adds advanced url configuration options to your content type to completely customize the url pattern for a content item.

BodyPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Allows the editing of text using an editor provided by the configured flavor (e.g. html, text, markdown).

CommonPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides common information about a content item, such as Owner, Date Created, Date Published and Date Modified.

DocumentPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides common metadata for a Document Media.

InvertedHeader.BooleanField.BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: Switch the header to white version.

IdentityPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Automatically generates a unique identity for the content item, which is required in import/export scenarios where one content item references another.

ImagePart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides common metadata for an Image Media.

LayoutPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Adds a layout designer to your content type.

MediaPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Turns a content type into a Media. Note: you need to set the stereotype to "Media" as well.

MenuPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides an easy way to create a ContentMenuItem from the content editor.

MetaInfoPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Add meta description and keywords for page

OEmbedPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides common metadata for an OEmbed Media.

InvertedHeader.BooleanField.BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: Switch the header to white version.
Switch the header to white version.

Summary.TextField.TextFieldSettings.Hint: This text is used when post is displayed in a list of posts.

TitlePart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides a Title for your content item.

VectorImagePart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides common metadata for a Vector Image Media.

VideoPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides common metadata for a Video Media.

WidgetPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Turns a content type into a Widget. Note: you need to set the stereotype to "Widget" as well.

MetaInfoPart.Description: Video Game industry specialists creating websites, mobile apps for iOS, Android and Windows, and enterprise software
MetaInfoPart.Keywords: Video Game, Websites, Mobile Apps, Mobile, iOS, Android, Windows, Moov2

3d%22https%3a%2f%2fmoov2websitedev.azureedge.net%2fmedia%2fDefault%2fArticles%2frecognition.png%22+%2f%3e%0d%0a%3ch3%3ere%3acognition%3c%2fh3%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eAfter+the+success+of+2015%26rsquo%3bs+Kinecthack%2c+Microsoft+collaborated+with+Moov2+again+to+run+re%3acognition+a+hack+weekend+focused+on+Microsoft%26rsquo%3bs+Cognitive+Services+APIs+and+new+Windows+10+features.+The+event+was+held+at+Microsoft+UKs+new+London+offices+at+Paddington+and+saw+almost+20+teams+of+hackers+working+for+36+hours+creating+some+amazing+projects.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3e%3ca+class%3d%22link--cta%22+href%3d%22http%3a%2f%2fmoov2-website-dev.azurewebsites.net%2fposted%2fre-cognition%22%3eWatch+the+event+video%3c%2fa%3e%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3c%2ful%3e","exportableData":"","index":1,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Break","data":"","exportableData":"","index":20,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"hr--spacer MetaInfoPart.Description: We teamed up with the folks at Supermassive Games to redesign their website with a focus on their work, recruitment and communicating their unique proposition.
MetaInfoPart.Keywords: Supermassive games, Orchard CMS, Website, Until Dawn
MetaInfoPart.Title: Supermassive Games

TextField.Summary.Text: All Day Hey! is a full-day conference for designers & front-end developers.

MetaInfoPart.Description: We sent junior designer, Jack, off to All Day Hey!, a full-day conference for designers & front-end developers, and here’s what he learned.
MetaInfoPart.Keywords: All Day Hey!, Meetup, Event, Conference
MetaInfoPart.Title: All Day Hey!

TextField.Summary.Text: Moov2 took part in the BIMA Digital Day 2016 at Itchen College, to see what the next generation hold.

MetaInfoPart.Description: We took part in the BIMA Digital Day at Itchen College to give the students insight into what a full-time job in the digital sector entails.
MetaInfoPart.Keywords: BIMA, BIMA Digital Day, Digital Day, Careers in Digital
MetaInfoPart.Title: BIMA Digital Day 2016

TextField.Summary.Text: Last week Dan and Lawrence attended Droidcon at the impressive Business Design Centre in Islington, London. This huge conference exhibited the latest in innovation on the Android platform, wearable technology, devices and best practice app development.

MetaInfoPart.Description: Dan and Lawrence attended Droidcon 2014 to hear the latest in innovation on the Android platform, wearable technology, devices and best practice app development
MetaInfoPart.Title: Droidcon 2014

TextField.Summary.Text: Hacksoton is an event close to Moov2s heart, and this year newbies Jack and Ben had their first taste of what it has to offer.

MetaInfoPart.Description: Hacksoton is an event close to Moov2s heart, and this year newbies Jack and Ben had their first taste of what it has to offer.
MetaInfoPart.Title: Hacksoton 2017

TextField.Summary.Text: "Hackdays" have exploded in popularity within the creative/digital industries in recent times. The general premise of a hackday is that passionate tech enthusiasts meet up and build stuff for fun and learning and even to kick off new venture ideas.
To give a bit more insight into what's going on here at Moov2 we've decided to write a monthly update summarising what's been happening at the Moov2 machine.

MetaInfoPart.Description: A review of what has been going on at Moov2 HQ over the last month.
MetaInfoPart.Title: Monthly review: January 2015

TextField.Summary.Text: On Saturday 21st March 2015, over 80 developers settled in to Microsoft's Cardinal Place offices for a 36 hour hackathon focusing on the Kinect for Windows v2 sensor.

irection-column+flex--direction-row%40medium+flex--wrap+double%40medium%22%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+padding--horizontal-large%40large+margin--bottom-large%22%3e%3cimg+alt%3d%22Kinecthack+introduction%22+src%3d%22https%3a%2f%2fmoov2websitedev.azureedge.net%2fmedia%2fDefault%2fArticles%2fkinect_hack_1.jpg%22+%2f%3e%0d%0a%3cp+class%3d%22padding--horizontal-none%22%3eThey+were+then+snapped+by+our+retro+polaroid+cameras+as+a+collage+of+attendees+and+projects+was+formed+whilst+everyone+settled+in+and+got+to+know+each+other.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+padding--horizontal-large%40large+margin--bottom-large%22%3e%3cimg+alt%3d%22Dan+welcomes+everyone+to+the+event%22+src%3d%22https%3a%2f%2fmoov2websitedev.azureedge.net%2fmedia%2fDefault%2fArticles%2fkinect_hack_2.jpg%22+%2f%3e%0d%0a%3cp+class%3d%22padding--horizontal-none%22%3eThe+event+kicked+off+with+an+introduction+from+Dan+of+Moov2+welcoming+everyone+to+the+event.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+padding--horizontal-large%40large+margin--bottom-large%22%3e%3cimg+alt%3d%22attendees+enjoying+the+Getting+Sttarted+workshop%22+src%3d%22https%3a%2f%2fmoov2websitedev.azureedge.net%2fmedia%2fDefault%2fArticles%2fkinect_hack_3.jpg%22+%2f%3e%0d%0a%3cp+class%3d%22padding--horizontal-none%22%3eImmediately+after+Microsoft%27s+Pete+Daukintis+hosted+an+extremely+popular+%22getting+started%22+workshop+which+walked+through+the+make-up+of+a+Kinect+for+Windows+project+which+enabled+everyone+to+get+up+and+running.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+padding--horizontal-large%40large+margin--bottom-large%22%3e%3cimg+alt%3d%22Attendees+working+on+their+projects%22+src%3d%22https%3a%2f%2fmoov2websitedev.azureedge.net%2fmedia%2fDefault%2fArticles%2fkinect_hack_4.jpg%22+%2f%3e%0d%0a%3cp+class%3d%22padding--horizontal-none%22%3eSoon+after+the+workshop%2c+everyone+took+residence+in+the+auditorium+where+they+would+be+for+the+rest+of+the+weekend+and+work+commenced+on+various+projects.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3c%2ful%3e","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"section--xx-wide","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Break","data":"","exportableData":"","index":6,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"hr--spacer hr--transparent","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Moov2.Website.Elements.Elements.Section","data":"","exportableData":"","index":10,"elements":[{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Html","data":"Content=%3ch2%3eThe+projects%3c%2fh2%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eAs+well+as+fun+and+food%2c+a+lot+of+incredible+projects+were+also+created+during+Kinecthack+London.+Check+out+the+following+videos+for+a+taste+of+what+our+attendees+were+working+on%3a%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eFull+list+of+projects+presented+during+show-n-tell%3a%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cul%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3ePong+in+Kinect+-+variation+of+the+classic+game+pong+controlled+by+either+Squats+or+Press+ups%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eSphero+Slalom+-+Kinect+controlled+Sphero+device%2c+a+remote+controllable+ball.%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eFlight+of+light+-+4+Player+Unity+game+which+was+adapted+to+support+Kinect+input%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eJames+Aliban%27s+Vase+maker+-+Through+the+use+of+the+Kinect+camera+and+Ppen+Frameworks+James+created+a+host+of+weird+and+wonderful+psychedelic+3D+vase+visualisations%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eSquat+analyser+-+exercise+form+analyser%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eSkelexplore+-+skeleton+and+muscle+explorer%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eDo+it+for+Walt+-+Disney+devs+prototyping+interactive+theme+park+guide+with+funny+mask+%2b+gloves+picture+sharing%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eKinect+%2b+Occulus+-+Tom+Bonner+worked+tirelessly+to+add+extra+immersion+to+an+Occulus+VR+experience+by+adding+limbs+via+Kinect+data%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eFlappy+Box+-+4+player%2c+flappy+bird+clone+with+kinect+powered+jump-to-flap!+Hilarious+and+exhausting.%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eMusic+Machine+-+Interactive+music+making+where+body+position+controls+the+audio%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eSkynect+-+Kinect+to+Skype+camera+integration%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eKinect+Graphics+-+Experiments+in+Kinect+powered+graphics+visualisations%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eKinect+talks+-+Fernando+used+Kinect+to+create+a+tool+to+assist+a+5+year+old+sufferer+of+cerebral+palsy+utilising+simple+body+movements+to+voice+outputs%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eHole+in+the+wall+-+Unity+game+using+Kinect+gestures+to+push+shaped+blocks+into+a+3D+advancing+wall%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eBox+sizer+-+Kinect+camera+and+depth+detection+to+measure+cardboard+box+sizes+for+a+logistics+company%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eMulti-kinect+server+-+Sending+compressed+Kinect+sensor+data+over+TCP+to+solve+the+sensor+proximity+challenge%2c+also+merging+of+multiple+Kinect+sensors+to+offer+full+360+point+cloud+data%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eBubblecatch+-+WPF+powered+multiplayer+game+where+players+have+to+catch+bubbles+and+avoid+explosives%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eKinect+Juggling+-+Using+Kinect+sensor+data+to+identify+a+thrown+ball+in+a+juggling+context+to+analyse+path+and+accuracy+of+juggler.+Impressive+tech+and+great+potential+for+a+juggling+learning+tool.%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eKinect+Kombat+-+Prototype+first+person+beat-em-up%2c+throw+fireballs!%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eHelicar+%26amp%3b+Lewis+-+Placing+3D+characters+in+a+modelled+3D+world%2c+to+be+taken+on+the+road+to+enable+children+to+visualise+their+imagined+environments%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eKinect+Shooter+-+Kinect+enabled+gun+weilding+shoot+em+up%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3e3D+Fuser+-+Mapping+kinect+sensor+camera+data+to+3D+models%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3c%2ful%3e","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Break","data":"","exportableData":"","index":11,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"hr--spacer MetaInfoPart.Description: We teamed up with the Microsoft team to organise Kinecthack, a hackathon focusing on the Kinect for Windows v2 sensor
MetaInfoPart.Title: Kinecthack: London

TextField.Summary.Text: Reasons to: is the award winning conference with a festival vibe, and this year the Moov2 design team got to experience it in full swing.

MetaInfoPart.Description: We sent the Moov2 design team to soak up some inspiration and ideas at this years ReasonsTo conference in London. Here's a review of their highlights.
MetaInfoPart.Title: ReasonsTo London 2017

TextField.Summary.Text: After last years amazing Kinecthack London, we’ve teamed up again with the MS Dev Experience team for another amazing event: re:cognition

MetaInfoPart.Description: We teamed up once again with Microsoft to host another event, this time with a focus on Microsoft's new Cognitive services.
MetaInfoPart.Title: Re:cognition

margin--bottom-gigantic@medium","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Moov2.Website.Elements.Elements.Section","data":"","exportableData":"","index":3,"elements":[{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Html","data":"Content=%3cp+class%3d%22breadcrumb%22%3e%3ca+href%3d%22%2fblog%22%3eBlog%3c%2fa%3e+%26gt%3b%26nbsp%3bRocket+Jump+Events%3a+Brighton%3c%2fp%3e","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Html","data":"Content=%3cp+class%3d%22text--large%22%3e1+host%2c+4+speakers%2c+18+local+showcases+and+over+100+attendees.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eThe+first+ever+Rocket+Jump+Event+took+place+at+Komedia+in+Brighton+on+the+24th+November.+There+were+two+parts+to+the+evening%3a+a+showcase%2c+followed+by+talks+from+established+games+industry+professionals.+The+showcase+provided+the+attending+organisations+with+space+to+show+off+their+latest+projects+and+the+talks+allowed+all+attendees+to+level+up+with+some+expert+knowledge+sharing.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cfigure+class%3d%22figure+figure--right%22%3e%3cimg+src%3d%22https%3a%2f%2fmoov2websitedev.azureedge.net%2fmedia%2fDefault%2fEvents%2fRocket%2520Jump%2fjordan-erica-webber.png%22+alt%3d%22Jordan+Erica+Webber%22+%2f%3e+%3cfigcaption%3eJordan+was+a+fantastic+host+and+did+a+great+job+introducing+speakers.%3c%2ffigcaption%3e%3c%2ffigure%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eOur+host+for+the+evening%2c+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fjawsew%22%3eJordan+Erica+Webber%3c%2fa%3e%2c+games+journalist+for+the+Guardian%2c+did+a+great+job+of+introducing+the+speakers%2c+keeping+things+on+time+and+the+audience+entertained+throughout+the+evening.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eAnother+feature+of+the+event+was+the+local+showcase+where+we+invited+games+studios+and+other+relevant+businesses+from+the+area+to+come+and+show+off+their+latest+projects.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eView+the+%3ca+href%3d%22http%3a%2f%2frocketjumpevents.com%2fnews%2fbrighton-showcase-the-full-list TextField.Summary.Text: Last week saw the inaugural, new-format, Soton Creatives. Soton Creatives is a local networking event for people working or studying in the creative and digital sectors in and around Southampton.

MetaInfoPart.Description: We attended the inaugural new format Soton creative events for an evening of networking and Lego Stop Motion
MetaInfoPart.Title: Soton Creatives
